name: forex_pair_position_30q
title: FX Pair 30Q + Position (Binary + Trade Hint)
description: Neutral, fact-based FX pair questionnaire (30 choice questions) plus a final trade-orientation question that returns a position JSON {answer, position, sl, tp, explanation}.

variables.name: texts
variables.description: Recent headlines, summaries, transcripts, and reports relevant to both currencies.

Final trade orientation â€” Based on the combined evidence in the news/texts for ${base_currency}/${quote_currency}, state whether news currently favors a BUY or SELL for the pair. Return a single JSON object with this exact shape: {
  "answer": "BUY or SELL",
  "position": "buy or sell",
  "sl": <number>,
  "tp": <number>,
  "explanation": "one concise sentence citing the strongest evidence"
